abstract: Stocks rise slightly as investors peruse mixed corporate earnings.
lead_paragraph: Ford Motor shares sank after the company reported a 9 percent drop in profit and warned that its full-year guidance might need to be cut.

headline.main: Wall St. Edges Higher as Investors Assess Earnings
headline.print_headline: Wall St. Edges Higher as Investors Assess Mixed Earnings

snippet: Ford Motor shares sank after the company reported a 9 percent drop in profit and warned that its full-year guidance might need to be cut....
